LanguageData.Mousekin_Beehive_HoneyPausedNotEnoughFlo: Paused: Not enough flowers in range ({0} of {1} required).
LanguageData.MousekinRace_Beehive_Instructions: To produce honey and beeswax, the Mousekin beehive must be at a temperature range of {0} ~ {1} and within range of at least {2} cells containing any of the following flowers:\n
LanguageData.Mousekin_FermentingBarrel_StartInsertion: Bring mead must or lager wort to the barrel to start fermentation process
LanguageData.Mousekin_FermentingBarrel_CancelBringing: Cancel bringing mead must or lager wort to the barrel.
